column4: does anyone know where eggdrop is installed to when i use apt-get?? thanks
does anyone know where eggdrop is installed to when i use apt-get?*
you want to find the file eggdrop that you have installed?
i want to find the eggdrop directory that has eggdrop.conf in it etc
I checked the man page, not there
thanks prince_jammys, sorry, i don't use linux too often except for an irc server that i have :p
and find /usr -name 'eggdrop*'   (no * at the beginning)  and if all else fails, the somewhat timeconsuming     sudo find / -name '*eggdrop*'
the time you got an error is because "find" is missing at the beginning of the command, so -type d is ok (finds directories only)
